entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
